EmailTemplate.name: EmailInvite
EmailTemplate.subject: You are invited to a new event!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Invite__c.Contact__c.Name},
You have been invited to {!Invite__c.PartnerEvent__c.Event_Name__c}!
{!PartnerEvent__c.Description__c}
We are looking forward to seeing you there!
The United Consult team
